title: The Root Schema
description: The root schema comprises the entire JSON document.

scenes.title: Scenes
scenes.description: An array containing all the possible scenes of the game. Each scene represents a different map in the game

items.title: Scene
items.description: The overview representation of a scene

name.title: Name
name.description: The name/id of the scene. Must be unique

map.title: Map
map.description: The path to the file containing the information about the map of this scene

emotional_requirements.title: Emotional Requirements
emotional_requirements.description: The emotional requirements for this scene to show to the player. This scene will only show to the player if the conditions stated in this object are ALL TRUE

priority.title: Priority
priority.description: In case there is a tie in the scenes, the framework chooses the one with the highest priority. This priority is defined by the designer

anger.title: Anger
anger.description: The condition for this scene to show up to the player according to their Anger value. If this object is null it means this emotion is not considered for this scene

value.title: Value
value.description: The value to be compared to

disgust.title: Disgust
disgust.description: The condition for this scene to show up to the player according to their Disgust value. If this object is null it means this emotion is not considered for this scene

value.title: Value
value.description: The value to be compared to

transitions.title: Transitions
transitions.description: List of transitions possible from this scene/map to other scenes and the necessary conditions for these transitions to be available

items.title: Transition
items.description: Description of a possible transition from scene A to scene B

name.title: Name
name.description: The name/id of the transition. Must be unique

to.title: To
to.description: The name/id of the scene to transition to

flag_requirements.title: Flag requirements
flag_requirements.description: Which flags should be checked to know if the player can make the transition

name.title: Name
name.description: The name/id of the flag. Must be unique

value.title: Value
value.description: The value to be compared to

events.title: Events
events.description: The list of events to take place in the scene. Can be cutscenes or gameplay

items.title: Event

name.description: The name/id of the event. Must be unique

file.title: File
